sources.title: Ten Pin Terrors (1953)
sources.description: Heckle and Jeckle, the talking magpies, have trouble sleeping because they live under a bowling alley... Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ten-pin-terrors-1953/

metadata.Plot: Heckle and Jeckle, the talking magpies, have trouble sleeping because they live under a bowling alley. When the bulldog who owns the alley refues to stop the noise, they give him a dose of his own medicine. They put glue in his bowling ball, harrass him at the pool table and place a bomb in his pants.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
